After attacking, if a skill grants another action through other means, Canto will trigger after that skill's extra action is performed.  Unit's base movement cost has no effect on the movement cost granted through Canto.  When in movement granted by Canto, unit cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than one more than any movement not already used up.)\*A/S Near Trace 1*\-; -; -; -; -\-; -; -; -; -\Passive, B, Trace, Atk, Spd\\\\

501720\Wings of Light\-\300\-\-\Passive(C)\Dragons Only\Seiros\Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X to allied Mythic Heroes (excluding unit) during combat in turns 1 through 5, where X is the turn number.  Effect only applied if number of Mythic Heroes on team (including unit) is three or less.\-\-; -; -; -; -\-; -; -; -; Seiros\Passive, C, Atk, Spd, Def, Res\\\\
501730\A/S Near Save\example\240\-\azure\Passive(C)\Armor Only\-\If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and foe initiates combat against ally within 2 spaces of unit, unit will swap places with that ally and enter combat in their place, including receiving all after-combat effects.  When this occurs, unit is granted Atk/Spd+`2/3/4` during combat.  This effect will not trigger if multiple units with the ability to save the ally are within range, or if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to.  After combat in which this occurs, movement-related after-combat effects do not occur.\-\-; -; -; -; -\-; -; -; Dedue; -\Passive, C, NearSave, Atk, Spd\\\\
501731\A/S Near Save\1\60\-\Azure 20 100 20\Passive(C)\Armor Only\-\If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and foe initiates combat against ally within 2 spaces of unit, unit will swap places with that ally and enter combat in their place, including receiving all after-combat effects. After combat in which this occurs, movement-related after-combat effects do not occur.\-\-; -; -; -; -\Dedue; -; -; -; -\Passive, C, NearSave, Atk, Spd\\\\

If multiple units who met the criteria have the same HP, the extra action is not granted.)\-\Tiki(Young)(Halloween); -; -; -; -\Tiki(Young)(Halloween); -; -; -; -\Harmonic, Atk, Spd\\\\
